techniques.comment: Gather Victim Host Information - Service and software enumeration
Software - Nmap service version detection identified OpenSSH 8.2p1 and nginx 1.18.0
Client Configurations - Web application framework and directory discovery via gobuster

metadata.name: Critical Discovery
metadata.value: /development/ directory contains id_rsa.pub (4096-bit RSA key) and log.txt (vulnerability info)

metadata.name: Application
metadata.value: Jack Of All Trades - Web server

techniques.comment: Application Layer Protocol - SSH command execution using recovered RSA private key

metadata.name: Command Execution
metadata.value: Post-authentication shell access with full system privileges

techniques.comment: Active Scanning - Port scanning and vulnerability assessment
Web Application Scanning - Directory enumeration to identify sensitive files

metadata.name: Sensitive Directories Found
metadata.value: /development/ - contains cryptographic keys and vulnerability hints

techniques.comment: Scanning IP Blocks - Full TCP port scan with Nmap on target 10.49.170.222

metadata.name: Ports Found
metadata.value: SSH port 22/tcp (open), HTTP port 80/tcp (open), 998 closed ports

techniques.comment: Steal or Forge Kerberos Tickets - Cryptanalysis to recover RSA private key from weak key generation

metadata.name: Vulnerability Type
metadata.value: Weak RSA Key Generation - Prime factors p and q extremely close

metadata.name: Key Components
metadata.value: Modulus n: 16360 bits, Public exponent e: 65537, Prime p: ~1024 bits, Prime q: ~1024 bits

metadata.name: Factorization Result
metadata.value: Successfully recovered p and q from n and e

metadata.name: Result
metadata.value: Complete RSA private key recovered - enables SSH authentication as root

techniques.comment: Obtain Capabilities - Acquire necessary tools and cryptographic knowledge
Code - PyCryptodome library for RSA key construction and cryptographic operations

metadata.name: Modules Used
metadata.value: RSA key construction, key export (PEM format)

metadata.name: Python Code
metadata.value: Custom script using Cryptodome.PublicKey.RSA and libnum for modular operations

techniques.comment: Develop Capabilities - Create tools and scripts for exploitation
Develop Capabilities: Code - Python script implementing RSA private key recovery from p, q, e, n

metadata.name: Script Purpose
metadata.value: RSA private key generation from recovered components

metadata.name: Key Generation Process
metadata.value: 1) Factor n into p and q, 2) Calculate d = modinv(e, (p-1)*(q-1)), 3) Construct RSA key object, 4) Export as PEM format

metadata.name: Output Format
metadata.value: PEM-encoded RSA private key (-----BEGIN RSA PRIVATE KEY-----)
